personalInfo.longBio: As a doctoral researcher at Aalto University, I focus on developing sustainable AI and cloud computing solutions that address the growing environmental impact of digital technologies. My research combines machine learning, distributed systems, and environmental science to create intelligent systems that automatically optimize for both performance and carbon efficiency.

research_areas.name: Carbon-Aware AI Inference
research_areas.summary: Developing intelligent systems that route AI inference requests to low-carbon regions and optimize timing to minimize environmental impact while maintaining service quality and latency requirements.
research_areas.details: This research focuses on creating algorithms that can dynamically shift AI workloads across geographically distributed infrastructure based on real-time carbon intensity data, renewable energy availability, and service level objectives.

research_areas.name: Energy Profiling & Benchmarking
research_areas.summary: Creating comprehensive frameworks for measuring and analyzing the energy consumption of AI models, including metrics like Time To First Token (TTFT), Tokens Per Second (TPOT), and GPU power usage.
research_areas.details: Developing standardized methodologies and tools for accurately measuring the environmental impact of AI systems, enabling researchers and practitioners to make informed decisions about model deployment and optimization.

research_areas.name: Green Software Engineering
research_areas.summary: Establishing best practices, design patterns, and metrics for creating energy-efficient software systems through techniques like intelligent caching, precision scaling, and adaptive serving strategies.
research_areas.details: Research into software engineering methodologies that prioritize environmental sustainability, including code optimization techniques, architectural patterns, and development practices that reduce energy consumption.

projects.title: Carbon-Aware Inference Orchestrator

projects.description: An intelligent orchestration system that automatically selects optimal deployment regions and timing for AI inference workloads. projects.title: Green Coding Patterns Library
